newsitem.title: CANADA: CaribGold reports Cuba gold results.
newsitem.headline: CaribGold reports Cuba gold results.

text.p: CaribGold Resources Inc said on Tuesday that all the drilling results from its exploration program in Cuba have been received.
Assay results from the Beatriz prospect indicate a geological resource of 1.1 million tonnes with a grade of 4.73 gram of gold per tonne or about 154,00 contained ounces of gold.
The zone remains open along the strike and to the southeast, CaribGold said.
Drill results from the South Elena project, near the Beatriz vein, showed gold values in four of eight of the last drill holes.
Grades ranged from 0.99 grams per tonne to 4.33 grams per tonne of gold over intervals ranging from 5.2 metres to 13.2 metres, the company said.
